thread.title: Koala given flowers by keeper for Valentine's Day | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Koala given flowers by keeper for Valentine's Day | Daily Mail Online

author: Ashleigh Davis For Daily Mail Australia
title: Koala given flowers by keeper for Valentine's Day | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share While the pair are getting plenty of hugs and their soft, furry ears scratched, the bunch of roses is squashed between them. One of the koalas peers over the keeper's shoulder, with his claws grasping the sleeves of her shirt. One of the koalas jumped straight into the keeper's arms and leaned up to nuzzle its nose against hers (pictured) He keeps on giving the keeper kisses while she scratches his belly and cuddles his soft fur, before he is joined by another koala in her arms While one of the koalas decides he's had enough, the other stays snuggled in the keeper's arms and leans up for a kiss. He turns over onto his back to be in a more comfortable and relaxed position, snuggling in and closing his eyes to have his belly rubbed. The second koala peers over the keeper's shoulder (pictured), with his claws grasping the sleeves of her shirt Read more: Share or comment on this article 250
